overview:
Richard Jones is the CEO and co-Founder of Engage Sciences, a social media marketing platform provider. Prior to setting up Engage, Richard had a very successful sales career, selling over $25m in software and sales at online platform provider Vignette over a six year period, being top EMEA sales person four years out of six, and averaging nearly 200% of target. This was followed by two years at Eloqua, helping drive the European expansion of B2B marketing automation in EMEA and again averaging over 200% of target.

Richard began his career in Client Services at global marketing agency Maritz, working exclusively on the IBM account, before moving into Enterprise software.
